property.name: hbase.zookeeper.quorum
property.description: Comma separated list of servers in the ZooKeeper Quorum. For this stack, point to the embedded ZooKeeper in the hbase-master container.

property.name: hbase.zookeeper.property.clientPort
property.description: Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg. The port at which the clients will connect.

property.name: hbase.cluster.distributed
property.description: The mode the cluster will be in. Possible values are false for standalone mode and true for distributed mode.

property.name: hbase.master
property.description: The host and port that the HBase master runs at.

property.name: zookeeper.znode.parent
property.description: Path of the parent znode in ZooKeeper for HBase.

property.name: hbase.master.info.port
property.description: The port for the HBase Master web UI.

property.name: hbase.regionserver.info.port
property.description: The port for the HBase RegionServer web UI.

property.name: hbase.client.retries.number
property.description: Maximum number of retries for HBase client operations.

property.name: hbase.client.pause
property.description: General client pause value in milliseconds.

property.name: hbase.unsafe.stream.capability.enforce
property.description: Controls whether HBase will check for stream capabilities.
